abstract: Pakistan offcials report at least seven people killed and 18 wounded after suicide bomber detonated explosives outside Shiite mosque in Rawalpindi.
lead_paragraph: Witnesses said that a suicide bomber detonated his explosives outside a Shiite mosque in Rawalpindi, near Pakistan’s capital.
snippet: Witnesses said that a suicide bomber detonated his explosives outside a Shiite mosque in Rawalpindi, near Pakistan’s capital.

headline.main: Blast Kills at Least 7 People at Mosque in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Blast Kills at Least 7 People Outside a Mosque
